changelogversion.changelogtext: Ability to change visible period for account transactions.
Major stability improvement: handling the database change after the notification is clicked on download.
Now accepting direct donations through our app web page.
Updated translations.
Catching all exceptions and offering to send the log to developers.
Introducing font icons.
Switched to Yahoo as the currency rates provider.
Correcting the currency exchange logic after switch to Yahoo.
Adding initial Turkish translation.
Stability improvements.
Updated translations.
fixed display of categories when creating a new subcategory.

Ability to set the default account for new transaction.

Adding floating button for creation of Sub/Categories.
Search for category now includes Splits.
Context menu for accounts on Home screen.
Improved currency picker for default currency.
Currencies now selected with a single click.
Other minor modifications and improvements.
Removing investment accounts on recurring transactions.
Disabling negative split amounts. Behaviour now matches the desktop application.
Correcting the detection of Split Category type.
